item.title: Setting Healthy Boundaries: Generating Geofences at Scale with Machine Learning (Part 1)
item.description: Want to learn more about this project and how we implemented it? Join me at MLOps Community Chicago on Nov 10, 2022 where Iâ€™ll be presenting this work with a special focus on the deployment and taking it through to production. At project44, we offer customers a whole assortment of data driven products that help them better understand their shipments and the movement of goods around the world. We build complex, intelligent tools that make logistics easier and more transparent.
